name: Fokker Dr.I
descption: A World War I triplane fighter famous for its association with the Red Baron.

name: Fokker D.VII
description: A highly successful German biplane fighter from World War I.

name: Fokker F.VII
description: A trimotor transport aircraft used in the 1920s and 1930s.

name: Fokker G.1
description: A heavy fighter and reconnaissance aircraft used by the Dutch during World War II.

name: Fokker 50
description: A turboprop airliner developed in the 1980s as an evolution of the F27.
